answers.answer: This is a diabetes forum. I suggest you look for a legal aid website to get an answer to your question.troytroy

technically, that's not the right way of doing things.  If you are not happy with the doctor and the services the doctor provided, you could complete a complaint form for the doctor to hopefully improve services for the future and for the rest of the public.

question: Is it illegal or considered fraud if a doctor forgets to completly fill out a CMN (prescription) and a DME company fills the missing information out themselves in order to service (ship) a patients products.
title: Fraud
